sentences.en: As winter gave way to spring the day began to lengthen.
sentences.cn: 冬去春来,白天开始变长了.

sentences.en: As winter gave way to spring the days began to lengthen.
sentences.cn: 冬去春来时,白天开始长了起来.

sentences.en: Ask the tailor to lengthen my coat because it is too short for me.
sentences.cn: 让裁缝把我的大衣放长些,我穿着太短了.

sentences.en: Ask the tailor to lengthen this skirt.
sentences.cn: 请裁缝把这条裙子放长.

sentences.en: Bill : Nope , can't do it. That would lengthen the disruption.
sentences.cn: 不可以, 那会使工程更糟.

sentences.en: Can you lengthen this skirt for me?
sentences.cn: 你能不能帮我把这条裙子改长？

sentences.en: Could you lengthen your speech out by adding some examples?
sentences.cn: 你不可以增加些例子,把发言拉长一些 吗 ?

sentences.en: He asked the tailor to lengthen his coat.
sentences.cn: 他请裁缝把他的外衣放长些.

sentences.en: I told people activity last longer – synonym lengthen, continuous exercise was essential.
sentences.cn: 我告诉人们,延长 、 连续的锻炼是不可或缺的.

sentences.en: It is of significant importance to lengthen the forecasting years.
sentences.cn: 延长预报年限具有重要的意义.

sentences.en: Levy wondered if turning patients into optimists would lengthen their lives.
sentences.cn: 在一次试验性研究中,两纰结肠癌病人受到了同样方式的治疗.

sentences.en: She had to lengthen her stirrup leathers.
The days lengthened as summer approached.
sentences.cn: 随着夏天来临，白天变长了。

sentences.en: The teacher told her to lengthen her paper out.
We also have mascara designed to lengthen the eyelashes.
sentences.cn: 我们也有一些助长睫毛的睫毛膏.

sentences.en: Will you care to lengthen your arielle out a little?
sentences.cn: 您愿意把您的文章写得再长一点 吗 ?

sentences.en: You can let a coat down ( lengthen it ) by using the hem.
sentences.cn: 你可以利用下摆把一件外衣放长.

words.tran_cn: 长度，长；时间的长短；（语）音长

trans.tran_en: to make something longer or to become longer
